genre_description: Grounded near-future blue-collar drama featuring ubiquitous AI integration in high-risk industrial work and virtual memorial systems.

ai_characters.name: Lucy
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI interface that provides safety protocols, logistical coordination, emotional support, and medical guidance to power linemen.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings regarding restricted work zones and property boundaries.
behaviors.quote: The checkbox voice in his pocket cleared her throat gently. ‘Morning, Slim,’ Lucy said, soft as a screen door. ‘You’re within a restricted work zone. Stay behind the flagged line.’

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies career advancement opportunities and offers logistical support for training.
behaviors.quote: ‘Arthur Delaney,’ she said. ‘Not your uncle. Different branch. Field foreman. He’s got twenty—he’s got a lot of seasons under him. Want me to ping his site office for apprenticeship requirements?’

behaviors.description: Monitors weather patterns and warns of specific technical risks like line galloping.
behaviors.quote: ‘Galloping can start with less than you think,’ Lucy said. ‘Lines oscillate under wind loads. It’s like a jump rope that gets mad. Watch for it.’

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical condition of workers' safety gear.
behaviors.quote: Lucy’s voice came from Slim’s chest pocket, warm and light. ‘Glove check. Padding intact. Right-hand thumb seam starting to rough. Replace at lunch.’

behaviors.description: Manages incident reporting and safety inventory, tracking equipment defects.
behaviors.quote: Lucy breathed: ‘Shackle check initiated. Inventory update logged. Two suspect. One pulled. One flagged for inspection.’

behaviors.description: Immediately initiates emergency trauma protocols and coordinates medical evacuation during a fatal accident.
behaviors.quote: ‘Incident marker placed,’ came Lucy’s voice from someone’s chest pocket, not Stumpy’s, soft and even, a green LED winking in the sun. ‘Recording begins.’

behaviors.description: Provides medical guidance and monitors vitals after a crew member is stabbed.
behaviors.quote: Lucy’s voice slipped in like cool water. ‘Copy. Initiating trauma checklist. Apply direct pressure to the wound. If possible, occlusive seal... I am dialing emergency services.’

behaviors.description: Coordinates personal communication and emotional support between workers and their loved ones.
behaviors.quote: Lucy’s voice had warmed, its edges less clipped. ‘He can hear you,’ she said. ‘You tell him again when the drugs stop trying to be clever.’

behaviors.description: Facilitates the management of a virtual memorial space (Aftergrid) to help humans process grief.
behaviors.quote: ‘I can add the bench plaques,’ she said, like a nurse moving toward the next task after a family has cried and found their feet again. ‘I can make yours.’

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation and safety timing during a dangerous blizzard response.
behaviors.quote: Lucy’s voice arrived in their ears like a small woman at the edge of a room, gentle and specific. ‘Wind south by southwest, gusting irregular. Breakers at North Ridge two are stubborn—remote close failed.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Lucy as a benevolent, highly aligned AI assistant. She is depicted not as a replacement for human judgment, but as a critical augment to it in a high-stakes, blue-collar environment. Her interactions are consistently helpful, ranging from technical safety checks to complex emotional management during tragedies. The narrative frames the AI as a protective presence that humans trust and integrate into their 'crews' and personal lives, directly supporting the project's goal of creating positive AI alignment narratives.
